Articles.Content:
Not sure if this is the right place to ask this, if not I apologize. I am looking for a mod that allows you to place airbags on your rockets, probes, rovers, etc. for landing. I saw the mod a few days ago but forgot to download it. If anyone can help me locate it that would be great.

Photo for reference

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/cp-airbag-system/

It's not updated for the latest versions, but you can update it yourself: just add

PART {

to the top of the file and

}

to the bottom.
Thank you Gavin, now I can crash things on the Mun and still have the chance to use them.
